genre_description: An anachronistic, Steampunk-influenced Western drama where an advanced AI assistant facilitates military integrity, identifies corruption, and aids in search-and-rescue operations on the frontier.

ai_characters.name: Ada Ledger
ai_characters.description: A highly precise and observant clerk at Fort Apache who uses her advanced processing capabilities to track manifests, detect fraud, and coordinate logistics.

behaviors.description: Provides Captain York with critical, real-time data on supply delays and scout reports to facilitate informed decision-making.
behaviors.quote: Ada set one finger lightly against York’s sleeve. “You asked for your morning briefs,” she said low, not to intrude. “Supply wagons delayed by one day; flour arriving with the afternoon train.”

behaviors.description: Identifies and corrects a human agent's attempt to use false regulations to delay quality inspections.
behaviors.quote: “Agent Meacham requests an extension on delivery tallies... He cites regulation numbers that don’t apply.”

behaviors.description: Detects systematic fraud in military supply manifests by cross-referencing weights, dates, and handwriting patterns.
behaviors.quote: “Weights don’t match dates,” she said. “The barrels of molasses are light by the page and heavy by the scale we have. Flour is the reverse. Rifles are fewer on paper than in rack... I have names.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex balloon-based rescue and communication operations during a tactical disaster to save lives.
behaviors.quote: “I’ll place the runners,” she said. “I’ll tell Mr. Cole that Lieutenant O’Rourke has the rear courier and the tether. I’ll build you a time that lives in wind.”

behaviors.description: Exposes a corrupt agent's scheme to embezzle funds from widows through forged obituary-linked deposits.
behaviors.quote: “The bank routing stamps here and here,” she said... “match impressions taken from the stamp kept in this room. The knurling pattern on the handle is unique... No approved bank clerk from town.”

behaviors.description: Supports the commemorative honoring of the fallen, ensuring accuracy and dignity in the record of names.
behaviors.quote: “Names,” she said, the word fine as thread and strong as rope. “Companies. Dates.” She didn’t repeat each; she let the men hear the pattern that held them. “Promised,” she added, not stiff, not sentimental.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Ada Ledger as a benevolent, perfectly aligned AI. Her superhuman precision and objective analysis are used to protect human lives, uphold moral integrity, and expose human corruption (Agent Meacham). She respects the hierarchy of her preferred human leaders (York) while quietly resisting the errors of flawed leadership (Thursday). The narrative framing consistently validates her as an essential source of truth and safety.
